column4: I'm a newb to linux and I'm using suse and I really like it but I hear such great things about ubuntu so i installed feisty and it looks sweet and i got it up and running and my video drivers installed but it just seems that apt and synaptic pale in comparison to smart and yast... is it just me? do i need to play around with it more? what are your thoughts?
wow i didn't know we needed to use proper grammer here... my fiance is nagging me to come cuddle with her, so i'm typing from the hip as fast as possible
wow thanks for nothing... seems like the suse guys are nicer anyway.
it pays to read/learn apt very well.
